pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mitba=====| | ||-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|| Build Status | ![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/Infinidat/mitba.png ) || Supported Versions | ![Supported Versions](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-2.7%2C3.5%2C3.6%2C3.7-green.svg) || Latest Version | ![Latest Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/mitba.svg) |`mitba` is a small library for implementing method or function-level caching for results.* [Documentation](https://mitba.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)Licence-------BSD3
